content.label: Does exactly what you need

title.label: It just makes the game better

content.label: Honestly I believe that because there are hundreds of items in binding of Isaac, a guide to what they do just makes the game better. On top of explaining items, characters and monsters are not skipped over in the slightest. This is by all means a must have! No problems yet!

This is a good app. However I paid to have ads removed yet ALL the ads are still there. The button to remove them let‚Äôs you pay but then doesn‚Äôt update the app. It‚Äôs broken or a scam.  UPDATE THE DEVELOPER SUGGESTION TO RE-INSTALL WORKED.

title.label: Fantastic in every sense of the word

content.label:
This would be an automatic 5 stars if the guide had trivia about the items/characters 
Also the ads are a tad annoying, they seem to pop up too often and last too long 
Other than those 2 mild complaints this is a fantastic app for veteran and newbies alike

It doesn‚Äôt just have every item in the game. But it has every character, boss, object, enemy, etc. It shows how to unlock all characters, it can categorize the items by room type or other criteria. It‚Äôs also super easy to look up items, even if you don‚Äôt know the name. For example, if an item is a big red circle, you can type into the search bar ‚Äúred‚Äù, and every item in the game that has red in the icon will pop up. Great app, ads are the only thing but they pop up pretty infrequently
Exactly what the title says
Say if you‚Äôre a casual player, or can‚Äôt be bothered to try and remember all of the description and meanings of them and the know all of what everything does.  This app is perfect for you!

title.label: I must've got a luck up with this app

content.label: Makes looking at items and what they do 1000x easier. You don't need internet to use it, you can find any item in any variation of the game, and the user interface is very friendly. 5/5 stars.
It‚Äôs kinda gay that you have to pay for it, but once you do, it‚Äôs so freaking helpful. My Isaac runs have been much much better because of this :)))
Very helpful but a little too many ads
Every thing I wanted and more
Truly is helpful when playing the game. Great easy access to all the valuable information on Isaac.
Awesome app, everything‚Äôs perfect.
So useful for my game

I‚Äôve looked at a lot of these guides on the App Store and this guide is by far the best one I‚Äôve seen. It‚Äôs very easy to use, it looks nice, and it lets you sync with steam. What more could you ask for?

this is a helpful app running around issac unskilled is bad but having this is very useful for knowledge and power, having a hard time on a boss find tips on it, dont know an item search it up, dont know what the trinket does welp its right in front of you. the app goes further than just these thing and i recommend it to anyone having a tuff time or having it when its needed.
Just too many adds for me otherwise really good ;)

title.label: The only guide is for Binding of Isaac

content.label: TBoI is a simple, fun, and almost never ending. Now I don‚Äôt like to have help for me learn and beat a game, but sometimes, with games like these, you can‚Äôt guess what all 1000 items do! The search feature is MEGA easy, along with little nifty ones like the ‚ÄúI have discovered/obtained this item‚Äù and I‚Äôve had this app for as long as I‚Äôve been playing Isaac on my PS4. Love you guys for making this. I think it‚Äôs even better than the wiki Isaac site too!!!! Love

title.label: Great guide except for the ads

content.label: Super helpful guide I just hate that ads pop up all the time

This app is so handy to keep track of all your unlocks in Isaac or just learn what each item does. I downloaded the free version and almost instantly bought the paid version. The developer has put allot of thought and care into this app and it shows. I‚Äôve got over 400 hours in Isaac and still love to just scroll through this app to re check item descriptions or different synergies. Much easier then going to the Isaac wiki or platinum god. You should definitely give this app a try!
I dont like the ads , there‚Äôs no reason for them

This app saves me so much time and trouble while playing Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+. I usually like to just get the item and learn what it does the first time around, but with SO many items, it‚Äôs easy to forget what each one does.

It is so quick to search for any item or trinket you come across with this app. Being able to filter by the Item Pool one comes from is handy, but even better is the color sorting that allows you to quickly find the info you need and get back to the game.

I haven‚Äôt fully utilized it yet, but the ability to mark the items you‚Äôve collected and bosses you‚Äôve defeated seems like a great help to any completionist.
Amazing app and extremely convenient.

title.label: Useful app, but the ads are insufferable.

content.label: I spend more than half my time with the app open watching a 30 second unskippable add for shovelware mobile games.

This has helped me a lot when playing. The app‚Äôs far more convenient than using the web, which is great. It pretty much covers everything I‚Äôve needed to find out on the spot. All in all, the full app‚Äôs worth it.

On another note, (this could be just me not being able to see it) I can‚Äôt seem to find where enemy champions are at in the app. Knowing exactly which color does what and the chances they have to drop their specific item could help a lot on hard mode. Thanks again for the help.

Honestly the best guide to use. Ever. The search is fantastic because you can use the saying to search for the item (if you‚Äôre like me, I remember these easier than the name of the item!). I‚Äôve downloaded a few different guides but this is the only one I kept! Best guide for Isaac!!!
It sure helped me

Very thorough. I use platinum god and the Isaac wiki while playing, and I‚Äôm not sure if this replaces them, but it‚Äôs easier to use in some ways and has a lot of great, well organized data

I think it a really good app that has helped me figure out what something does in the game. In a game like Isaac it can get hard to remember what each item does or how to unlock them or what a certain room does. I recommend this app and think it is really nice to have. Only thing I would like to have is the option to link it to an Xbox account because I don‚Äôt like having to go and toggle each thing that I unlock/finished manually. But other than that, it‚Äôs really good.
Very easy to work guide with everything you need to know! Thanks for the guide!!
This app has helped me when I need to figure something out! It is missing one or too things, but overall, it is great. It even has a color coded section for items and trinkets.
I personally think that this app is so useful because it just tells me what everything does and even shows me some secret stuff
Awesome learning tool.
honestly for being free, it‚Äôs really good. even though you can go online and get the same thing without downloading anything, it isn‚Äôt categorized in the same way.

title.label: The free version has too many ads

content.label:
Two stars because the app works.

The devs of this app really want you to pay them $1.99 to remove the ads.  The ads are beyond annoying, they play sound at maximum volume *even if your phone is on silent!*  I find that unacceptable.
Has everything you need to know!

title.label: This makes the game so much easier

I know I‚Äôm a little late on picking this game up but I just bought a switch and have been enjoying it thanks largely to this app.The menus are super easy to navigate and it list such detailed information. I‚Äôm so glad that this app even exists and that the developer still updates it regularly. 
I am really wanting to support this developer but I didn‚Äôt know if the ad version or the paid version would work best. I might just do both. Thanks!!

A

Good

title.label: I love this, 1 thing about ads

content.label: I LOVE THIS! But people it‚Äôs cheap to just get remove adds! No more add problems! Cya!

This is a really convenient guide, but I would like to see some improvements. Although it is convenient in the fact that you can use the guide while playing, I feel there should be a sorting system to find related items faster, like an explosive or heart increasing. Ignoring that though, this game should be a 5 star guide, and I would recommend it to new and old players alike.
